About us


 Lightning Development Studios

 LDS is a group of five high school students at Sage Hill School in Newport Coast, California. We are all learning Java, and for most of us, Circuit Crawler is our first game design project. Our goal is to use this game to support the Youth For Technology Foundation, as well as increase awareness about it. 100% of the profits from Circuit Crawler will go to YTF. Expect more from us in the future!
 More about LDS: http://lightningdevelopment.wordpress.com

 Youth For Technology Foundation

 YTF is a non-profit organization dedicated to bringing technological literacy to underprivleged communities, both in developing countries and in the United States. With a special focus on youth, YTF helps bring the modern, digital world to communities around the world, and inspire innovation among the members of these communities.
 More about YTF: http://www.youthfortechnology.org
